entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016
